name: NYDailyNews
text:
The viral beating of a Macy's employee in Michigan was "unprovoked," despite racism claims, the department store says.

Flint Township police are looking for the man seen hitting the employee and “a second individual” who was with him.
https://t.co/dl8Md3u6h3

name: NYDailyNews
text:
SEE IT: A Brooklyn pharmacy owner scared off three would-be robbers with help from a little barking dog.

One of the robbers brandished a gun and climbed over the counter, but ran off after getting pushed and seeing the little white dog barking.
https://t.co/A9tnhSCSPP

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Twitter banned right-wing British columnist Katie Hopkins citing "hateful conduct."

The social media platform didn't state which of Hopkins’ comments finally did her in.
https://t.co/XCtJStlXbo

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The MLB won’t make a counter offer to the Players Association's 70-game plan.

It also wouldn’t agree to a 2020 season with more than 60 games.

“Our Executive Board will convene in the near future to determine next steps," the union said in response.
https://t.co/JX1U4ugWW7

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The North Face halted its Facebook advertising, and is calling on others to boycott as well.

The decision comes in support of civil-rights organizations lambasting Facebook for its lax hate-speech policies.
https://t.co/ifJrJXYJ7E

name: NYDailyNews
text:
UPDATE: Manhattan U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman is refusing to step down, and intends "to ensure that this Office’s important cases continue unimpeded.”

Berman's response comes after an announcement by Attorney General William Barr that he was resigning.
https://t.co/c88wpv9blW

name: NYDailyNews
text:
We’ll begin in New York and end in Baltimore, with the Kentucky Derby squeezed in the middle. 

Here are five stories to watch as we embark on the Bizarro-World Triple Crown:
https://t.co/PYZxkpTDHL

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Kurt Cobain’s "MTV Unplugged" guitar already hit a $1M bid at auction.

The opening $250,000 bid for the instrument was quickly eclipsed by the $1M call. The auction ends Saturday.
https://t.co/N2Lbs7f0An

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Lakers owner Jeanie Buss revealed a vile racist letter from a "fan," telling her to go to hell to join Kobe Bryant.

"Acknowledge the racism that exists in our country and around the world, and pledge to stop ignoring it," Buss urged in her post.
https://t.co/q9wCoXMSi1

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Justyna Zubko-Valva, the mother of slain autistic boy Thomas Valva, tells us of her continued outrage by systemic failures.

Her estranged husband, NYPD veteran Michael Valva, and his fiancee already faced murder charges.
https://t.co/DnHbfsylRJ

name: NYDailyNews
text: Life gets better with age. Your self-esteem is on the rise and the chance to cultivate stronger relationships with those you love most becomes easier. https://t.co/BsvJES8ZpP

name: NYDailyNews
text:
LUPICA | The Giants should be the team that gives Colin Kaepernick his shot at an NFL return.

It's in John Mara’s football DNA. His father was one of the great gentleman in NFL history, 

It won't change the course of Giants history with their young  QB.
https://t.co/FEa6daEQmQ

name: NYDailyNews
text:
